trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress"></xref> control in a visual designer.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class documentation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.UpdateProgressDesigner"></xref> class.

The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.UpdatePanelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
Returns the HTML markup to display the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress"></xref> control and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.
An object that contains control designer regions for the associated control.
The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, which includes all control designer regions.
Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress"></xref> control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> object to fetch content for.
A serialized copy of the template that is used to render the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control at design time.
Specifies the content for the editable region of the control at design time.
An object that provides the name of the region to update.
A serialized template for the associated control.
Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy instead of the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
